plugin.name: WeatherFax
plugin.summary: Open fax image files or decode audio faxes and overlay on chart
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Open image files directly or decode audio faxes to an image, simple calibration to overlay image on top of charts. Converts images in mercator, polar, conic and uniform coordinates. Convert any image into a raster chart. Built in HF Radio Fax database for SSB and for internet retrieval from meterological sites.
